mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.loantyp AS "loantyp", a.currency AS "currency", a.exchangerate AS "exchangerate", a.loanprop AS "loanprop", a.loanamt AS "loan_amt", a.fixamt AS "fixamt", a.interestcount AS "interestcount", a.principalrate AS "principalrate", a.interestrate AS "interestrate", a.commitrate AS "commitrate", a.graceperiod AS "graceperiod", a.repayperiod AS "repayperiod", a.repaytype AS "repaytype", a.pkfundssrc AS "fea_fundssrc.id"
LEFT JOIN fea_fundssrc b ON b.id = a.pkfundssrc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fea_fundssrc_t( id, remarks, del_flag, loantyp, currency, exchangerate, loanprop, loanamt, fixamt, interestcount, principalrate, interestrate, commitrate, graceperiod, repayperiod, repaytype, pkfundssrc ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{loantyp}, #{currency}, #{exchangerate}, #{loanprop}, #{loan_amt}, #{fixamt}, #{interestcount}, #{principalrate}, #{interestrate}, #{commitrate}, #{graceperiod}, #{repayperiod}, #{repaytype}, #{fea_fundssrc.id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fea_fundssrc_t SET remarks = #{remarks}, loantyp = #{loantyp}, currency = #{currency}, exchangerate = #{exchangerate}, loanprop = #{loanprop}, loanamt = #{loan_amt}, fixamt = #{fixamt}, interestcount = #{interestcount}, principalrate = #{principalrate}, interestrate = #{interestrate}, commitrate = #{commitrate}, graceperiod = #{graceperiod}, repayperiod = #{repayperiod}, repaytype = #{repaytype}, pkfundssrc = #{fea_fundssrc.id} WHERE id = #{id}
